results.content: Good course. But he really meant when he said "Basic Understanding of Bootstrap Framework" because there are basic things he mention in the video that I've never heard before. This course is a bit fast and that is a good thing. I had to stop and figure out few things on my own. If you are brand new to Bootstrap, I don't recommend this to you until you've learn the basic first. But overall, good course. He gets right to the point.
results.content_html: Good course. But he really meant when he said "Basic Understanding of Bootstrap Framework" because there are basic things he mention in the video that I've never heard before. results.content: The design layout of the website seems very promising and modern features are implemented in this course.  There were some issues from my end initially but were fixed easily as I progressed. I recommend this course if you want to practice coding front-end websites which are responsive and dynamic. The instructors pace is fast but if you are familiar with a little bit of coding then your journey to debug and code will be easy.

results.content: Brak jakichkolwiek tekstowych materiałów do kursu. To właściwie nie jest kurs. Autor tworzy projekt niczego nie tłumacząc. Robi to wszystko 3x za szybko. Jego akcent sprawia, że ciężko go zrozumieć. Ogólnie - dramat i strata pięniędzy.
